Title: Enacts the no blank checks for medical debt act
Summary: Enacts the no blank checks for medical debt act to require the use of a uniform patience financial liability form which is prohibited from using language that requires patients to assume an unlimited or unspecified amount of financial liability beyond the amount specified in a good faith estimate from the provider.
LawCode: Add ยง2832, amd ยง18-c. Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to enacting the no blank checks for medical debt act
